title: 1879: Improving Results in the Gym By Doing Less, Tips for Correcting Mid-Back Pain, Training for Bodybuilding & Martial Arts at the Same Time & More (Listener Live Coaching)
description:
In this episode of Quah (Q & A), Sal, Adam & Justin coach four Pump Heads via Zoom.

  • Mind Pump Fit Tip: Some of the BEST things you can do to BRING UP a lagging body part is to START your workout with an isolation exercise. (3:04)
  • Is the Earth spinning faster? (13:34)
  • Where does the southern stereotype come from? (17:50)
  • Teacher/student sexual relations, the age of consent, and age gaps in relationships. (21:32)
  • Blue light before bed for your children. (30:25)
  • Magic Spoon is making MOVES! (34:05)
  • An interview with Joe De Sena from Spartan Race. They discuss a special cause that Mind Pump is going to be a part of, the Ultra Race Championships in Tahoe, the current state of Spartan, and the importance of practicing hard shit. (40:10)
  • #ListenerLive question #1 - How do you recover from excessive binging after a bikini competition, and how do you handle weak leptin/ghrelin signals post-show or diet? (1:01:38)
  • #ListenerLive question #2 - Is it possible to train Jiu Jitsu while competing in bodybuilding? (1:20:01)
  • #ListenerLive question #3 - How do I prevent injury, strengthen, and mobilize my intercostal muscles in my mid-upper back? (1:34:55)
  • #ListenerLive question #4 - How do I program 3 full-body workouts a week, while also making it to the gym 5-6 days a week without overtraining? (1:42:57)

Related Links/Products Mentioned

  • Ask a question to Mind Pump, live! Email: live@mindpumpmedia.com
  • Visit Felix Gray for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!
  • Visit Magic Spoon for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!
  • August Special: TOP SELLING PROGRAMS COMBINED FOR ONLY $99.99!
  • Mind Pump x Spartan Championships , Use code Give-mindpump
  • Mind Pump #1745: How To Pack On Muscle To Your Lagging/Stubborn Body Parts
  • Earth is spinning faster than ever, scientists say no cause for concern
  • How a Worm Gave the South a Bad Name | NOVA | PBS
  • #1850 - Whitney Cummings - The Joe Rogan Experience
  • Former Texas teacher gets 60 days in jail for sexual relations with underage student
  • Children under the age of 10 who get less than nine hours of sleep each night develop less brain matter - and are more likely to suffer from mental health and memory issues, study finds
  • Visit Path Water for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners! **Code “mindpump” at checkout for the discount**
  • No Retreat: Business Bootcamp
  • Visit Drink LMNT for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!
  • The Best Way to Breathe For Maximum Power & Strength (Ben Pollack) | MIND PUMP TV

  • Joe De Sena (@realjoedesena)  Instagram
